Characters patient : - list item one : 168 patient , median age 48 year ( range 16-75 years） proven rT1-2 NPC diagnose - list item two : Treated four different irradiation modality ( 3D-CRT , IMRT , BT , BT Combined 3D-CRT IMRT ) . - list item three : Median time recurrence 30 month ( range 1-180months ) . The median follow-up time 28 month ( range , 4-135 month ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intensity Modulated Radiotherapy Recurrent T1-2 Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : Recurrent T1-2 Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma ( rT1-2 ) may salvage 3D - CRT（3D-Conformal Radiotherapy） , IMRT（ Intensity Modulated Radiotherapy） , Brachytherapy ( BT ) , BT combine 3D - CRT IMRT . The aim study address efficacy toxicity profile aforementioned four modality rT1-2 NPC . Methods Materials : 168 patient , median age 48 year ( range 16-75 years） proven rT1-2 NPC diagnose treated four different irradiation modality ( 3D-CRT , IMRT , BT , BT Combined 3D-CRT IMRT ) . Median time recurrence 30 month ( range 1-180months ) . The median follow-up time 28 month ( range , 4-135 month ) .
DOC.criteria: recurrent T12 nasopharyngeal carcinoma patient non recurrent T12 nasopharyngeal carcinoma patient
DOC.keyword: superiority , re-irradiation , IMRT , recurrent T1-2 NPC
